extendedInfo.description: Bombs Away on Barrels is a high velocity tilting and tapping game. Wonderful 40+ addicting puzzles have you speeding your reckless bomb through exploding barrels to save the castle. Download it now!Multiple levels and unique objects to beat the game. Run through time warps, bouncy springs and use an unlimited amount of turbo firework boosts. Amazing and fun game for all ages in high definition with real physics and amazing graphics. Use trajectory and gravity to roll your way into the finals with Bombs Away on Barrels.FEATURES:+ 40 Addicting Levels+ Tilt or Tap Your Way To The Treasure+ Springs To Bounce Out Of Level+ Time Warps...+ Turbo Boost for the Hard Core Gamers+ Relaxing Tunes For The Casual Gamers+ Real Physics and Smooth Game Play+ High Definition Graphics & SoundsSee if you can reach the deadly time warped upper levels...Download it now.
